a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif;font-weight:500

text.tspan: Share with alcohol or drug use disorders, men vs. women,
Alcohol or drug use dependence is defined by the International Classification of Diseases as the presence of three or more
indicators of dependence for at least a month within the previous year. Tobacco smoking is not included.
Share of women with alcohol or drug use disorders
Share of men with alcohol or drug use disorders
Data source: IHME, Global Burden of Disease (2019)
Note: To allow comparisons between countries and over time this metric is age-standardized.
